extraInfo:
The Notion SDK provides a simple and easy to use client for the Notion API. It supports all Notion API endpoints and provides TypeScript types for better development experience.

Key features:
- Read & Update Notion Pages
- Write comments
- Upload & retrieve files
- Full TypeScript support
- Error handling with type guards
- Pagination utilities

For more information, visit the official Notion API documentation at https://developers.notion.com
